original_text: Do not think about the things that will help you. Instead, each of you should think about what will help other people.
korean_text: 누구든지 자기의 유익을 구하지 말고 남의 유익을 구하라

sentences.original_text: Do not think about the things that will help you
sentences.korean_translation: 자신에게 도움이 될 것들에 대해 생각하지 말라

sentences.original_text: each of you should think about
